title: Microsoft Graph: Data Connect - Hybrid Workplace Analytics Template
description:
,
Leverage Microsoft 365 data from Microsoft Graph Data Connect to obtain actionable information about the collaboration between people of the organization. Todayâ€™s challenges of a work environment that has shifted to embrace hybrid modalities often focus on designing the workplace for people success and wellbeing, as well as measuring the effectiveness of changes. By obtaining insights on how employees engage with hybrid work, managers can take action to identify and reduce employee churn, focus on inclusiveness, and optimize workplace setups for efficiency and employee satisfaction.
